page.title: 08Glenfiddich Distillery.
page.content: Glenfiddich Distillery was established in 1887 by William Grant and sons.Born and brought up in Dufftown's Conval Street,William Grant worked at Mortlach to earn the money to build his own distillery.It was completed on Christmas Day 1887.The Glenfiddich is situated on the outskirts of Dufftown.The malt whisky has remaied unchanged in it's making for almost 100 years.The water is obtained from the Robbie Dhub spring.The copper {stills}are the originals which William Grant bought.The whisky goes through 5 stages before being put into green triangular bottles.Glenfiddich is unique inn that the whisky is bottled in the same place as it is made.Guided tours are given of the diistillery at no charge.At the end you are able to sample the unique malt whisky.
